name: DR Lab
description:
Help Doctor Lab get the experiment right. Use the blue lab equipment to help keep it moving...

For the lo rez jam using PIX64 console; open PIX64 and navigate to DrLab)

I'm trying to make more prototypes for game jam to see which ones (if any) you think could be turned into a fun multilevel game leave comments/feedback! I think I have one more game arriving soon! Thanks.
